Text:
All music files in this torrent have their ID3 tags filled with such things as "no title" and "no artist", which shows up in the Winamp playlist. I thought this was really annoying, but instead of just complaining I did something about it. The same albums, but with fixed tags, file names and with SFV files, can be found at:
http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3344148
